member.name: M:NLog.ComInterop.ILogger.Log(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the specified level.

member.name: M:NLog.ComInterop.ILogger.Debug(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Debug level.

member.name: M:NLog.ComInterop.ILogger.Info(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Info level.

member.name: M:NLog.ComInterop.ILogger.Warn(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Warn level.

member.name: M:NLog.ComInterop.ILogger.Error(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Error level.

member.name: M:NLog.ComInterop.ILogger.Fatal(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Fatal level.

member.name: M:NLog.ComInterop.ILogger.IsEnabled(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the specified log level is enabled.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the specified log level is enabled.

member.name: P:NLog.ComInterop.ILogger.IsDebugEnabled
member.summary: Returns the boolean value indicating whether the Debug level is enabled.

member.name: P:NLog.ComInterop.ILogger.IsInfoEnabled
member.summary: Returns the boolean value indicating whether the Info level is enabled.

member.name: P:NLog.ComInterop.ILogger.IsWarnEnabled
member.summary: Returns the boolean value indicating whether the Warn level is enabled.

member.name: P:NLog.ComInterop.ILogger.IsErrorEnabled
member.summary: Returns the boolean value indicating whether the Error level is enabled.

member.name: P:NLog.ComInterop.ILogger.IsFatalEnabled
member.summary: Returns the boolean value indicating whether the Fatal level is enabled.
